mil3.5.9:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.5.9:1.2_0: “A is the dragon who knows by an elephant, and knows that it arises?”
mil3.5.9:1.3_0: “Consider arises; I shall know that it arises.”
mil3.5.9:2.2_0: “Great king, if a farmer knows that the earth was raining and the rain will fall down on the sky, it will be extinguished in this very life?”
mil3.5.9:2.4_0: “In the same way, a great king knows that arises; I will be expelled.”
mil3.5.9:4.1_0: The ninth understanding of Ānanda gives rise to understanding.
